ResearchProjectDef.label: Nanofibers
ResearchProjectDef.description: By using our newly designed nanoloom, we can start to weave materials on a molecular level. This fiber is a perfect way to test our nanoloom, and make sure all functions work as intended. It is also somewhat better than normal fabric.

rulesStrings.li: subject->nanowaving
subject_story->used a nanoloom to weave a high-strength cloth
subject_story->downloaded a nanoloom configuration to weave nanofiber

ResearchProjectDef.label: Interlocking Materials
ResearchProjectDef.description: Now that we have proven our nanoloom to be fully functional, we can start to interweave different types of materials. Carbon and nanofiber should create a particularly resistant fabric.

rulesStrings.li: subject->interlocked weaving
subject_story->used a nanoloom to weave highly advanced materials for more protective clothing

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ferrogel Insulation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Ferrogel is a particularly good insulation material. By interweaving it with nanofiber, we believe we could create a fabric with similar properties. This fabric could be used to create apparel that protects the wearer from a wider range of temperatures than possible through most other means.

rulesStrings.li: subject->ferroweaving
subject_story->used a nanoloom to weave highly insulated materials for clothing
subject_story->developed an outfit capable of protectign the wearer from extreme temperatures

ResearchProjectDef.label: Restructured Aero-tungsten
